meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Drummond Jenn Frohlich Amelia Hershberger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7215.

td.p: Mike Drummond, an application scientist from Columbus, Ohio
Jenn Frohlich, a veterinarian from San Diego, California
Amelia Hershberger, a management analyst from Albany, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $43,000)

tr.td: AVENGERS IN OTHER ROLES
FASHIONABLE BRIEFS & SHORTS
THE EARLY 20th CENTURY
TURN ON YOUR T-V
(Alex: Each response will begin with the letter "T" and have a "V" in it, as well.)
O CANADA
OUR HOME & NATIVE LAND

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jenn: Who is... Iron Man?)
[Initially ruled incorrect; reversed during the first break because "we were a little vague".]

Robert Downey Jr.

AmeliaJenn
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
